sourcesContent:
import axios from "axios" export default function TodoList({get, style, tasks}) { function remove(e){ let data = Array.from(e.target.parentElement.parentElement.querySelectorAll("td")).map(item=>item.textContent)[0] let id = e.target.parentElement.parentElement.id let url = String(window.host_addr+"api/delete/"+data+"/"+id).replace(" ", "%20") console.log(url) axios.get(url, { mode: 'no-cors', headers: { 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*', 'Content-Type': 'application/json',} }) } function complete(e){ let data = Array.from(e.target.parentElement.parentElement.querySelectorAll("td")).map(item=>item.textContent)[0] let id = e.target.parentElement.parentElement.id let url = String(window.host_addr+"api/mark/"+data+"/"+id).replace(" ", "%20") console.log(url) axios.get(url, { mode: 'no-cors', headers: { 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*', 'Content-Type': 'application/json',} }) } return (
{tasks.map((task) => ( ))}
What To Do Due Date First Name Last Name
{task.what_to_do} {task.due_date} {task.first_name} {task.last_name} Finished Remove
) }
